welcome_message_body: Welcome to Goldbach, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its scenic landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Goldbach has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal of Frankfurt International Airport, currently under construction and planned to open in 2023.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.
